scripts.dev:styles: stylus --print --compress --use rupture --use autoprefixer-stylus --include-css --inline --include node_modules assets/main.styl | cleancss > dist/main.css
scripts.dev: parallelshell "npm run watch" "npm run dev:styles" "npm run dev:serve"
scripts.watch: watchify -d -e -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] main.js -o build.js -v
scripts.build: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ react es2015 ] ] main.js -o build.js -v
